
The server generated two RSA keys but mistakenly reused a prime. Can you recover the message? Ciphertext: 429051046769615527732192994901276030410908219020446126486367062851194898944734667256376757122315330473686503597642931135037395907866114728291036239639100006341959909077637211282475780802232484417339779938401569563931999803747435006


The flag format is flag{...}
n=935525127718521196788922914934287577539504393815243500066394293983370901596995288752253684235759261294983535251454789678990289793207728019106595199172941258183279695713938300598605913383181663935460224929096011661889147384276511009, e=832087797611577775856199694417065457676907160888071623018937154124371227990694987364357528356529281176910114592301348860399224588300476742078163748748585655654139932412675183989560965006141699084121577969364361319506808238780492883

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{lkku5azc}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 429051046769615527732192994901276030410908219020446126486367062851194898944734667256376757122315330473686503597642931135037395907866114728291036239639100006341959909077637211282475780802232484417339779938401569563931999803747435006
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=935525127718521196788922914934287577539504393815243500066394293983370901596995288752253684235759261294983535251454789678990289793207728019106595199172941258183279695713938300598605913383181663935460224929096011661889147384276511009, e=832087797611577775856199694417065457676907160888071623018937154124371227990694987364357528356529281176910114592301348860399224588300476742078163748748585655654139932412675183989560965006141699084121577969364361319506808238780492883
extra_info: p=30586355253912179668311701917755240214591601557262184163961477721076190896019562152003873384855947098940188302324753, q=30586355253912179668311701917755240214591601557262184163961477721076190896019562152003873384855947098940188302324753, Ï†(n)=935525127718521196788922914934287577539504393815243500066394293983370901596995288752253684235759261294983535251454728506279781968848391395702759688692512074980165171345610377643163761001389624811156217182326299767691267007671861504
